greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: G.f.: 5/(2+3*sqrt(1-20*x)).
comment: Number of walks of length 2n on the 6-regular tree beginning and ending at some fixed vertex. Hankel transform is A135349. - _Philippe Deléham_, Feb 25 2009
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
formula: a(n) = upper left term in M^n, M = an infinite square production matrix as follows:
D-finite with recurrence: n*a(n) = 2*(28*n-15)*a(n-1) - 360*(2*n-3)*a(n-2) . - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 20 2012
results.author: _Philippe Deléham_, Aug 23 2007
